mapper.insert: insert into CRM_COMPANY_INFO (COMPANY_ID, TAX_TYPE, CITY, DISTRICT, FINANCE_DISK_TYPE, TAX_RATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financeDiskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update CRM_COMPANY_INFO set TAX_TYPE = #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_DISK_TYPE = #{financeDiskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE} where COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select COMPANY_ID, TAX_TYPE, CITY, DISTRICT, FINANCE_DISK_TYPE, TAX_RATE, UPDATE_DATE from CRM_COMPANY_INFO
